Metadata.title: Aliigo — Your Business-Owned AI Assistant
Metadata.description: A business-owned AI concierge for websites and messaging channels that answers questions instantly, shares trusted information, supports visitors, and guides them to the appropriate next step — for businesses, nonprofits, and educational institutions alike.

hero.title: Give your website
hero.subtitle: Aliigo is an AI assistant that lives on your website. It answers questions, understands intent, and turns real conversations into qualified leads automatically.
hero.qualifier: Best for businesses with consistent website traffic or a high volume of repetitive customer questions.

featuresGrid.title: More than just a chat window.
featuresGrid.subtitle: Aliigo doesn’t just “chat.” It understands your business logic to drive real results.

card1.title: Trains on your data instantly
card1.desc: No manual flowcharting. Aliigo scans your website, PDFs, and docs to build a knowledge base that answers accurately from day one.

card2.title: Captures contacts naturally
card2.desc: It detects intent and asks for details only when someone is genuinely interested.

card3.title: Drives the next step
card3.desc: More than text. It can show action buttons to book meetings, start trials, or open the right page.

card4.title: Full visibility into conversations
card4.desc: See what customers ask, spot content gaps, and watch your conversion rate improve over time.

growth.name: Growth
growth.subtitle: Best for clinics, agencies, and service businesses.

pro.name: Pro
pro.subtitle: Best for high-traffic or high-value businesses.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: You define the knowledge and goals. Aliigo does the rest.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.desc: Choose a plan, add a payment method, and start your 30-day free trial.

step2.title: Add business information
step2.desc: Services, hours, location, tone, and what a qualified lead looks like for you.

step3.title: Go live
step3.desc: Add a small snippet to your site and the assistant is live immediately.

q1.a: Aliigo is an AI assistant that lives on your website. It answers visitor questions and turns conversations into qualified leads.

q2.a: It is an assistant, not a script. It uses your business knowledge and adapts to each conversation.

q3.a: No. It handles first contact and qualification so your team only deals with real, high-intent conversations.

q4.a: Simple. We provide a small snippet for your website. Most businesses can go live the same day.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This policy explains what cookies are, how Aliigo uses them, and how you can manage them.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.content: A cookie is a small text file stored in your browser that allows a site to remember your visit and preferences.

section2.title: 2. Cookies used on this website
section2.technicalDesc: Cookies required for navigation, authentication, and access to restricted areas such as the dashboard.
section2.analyticalDesc: Cookies that help measure usage and improve the service (for example, analytics providers).

section3.title: 3. Third Parties
section3.content: This website may use third-party services for analytics, hosting, authentication, and service delivery.

section4.title: 4. Managing cookies
section4.content: You can disable or delete cookies from your browser settings (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge).

privacidad.title: Privacy Policy
privacidad.intro: Aliigo takes privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

section2.title: 2. Purposes
section2.point1: Create and manage user accounts and provide the SaaS service.
section2.point2: Manage billing and payments for contracted services.
section2.point3: Provide customer support and service communications.
section2.dataRetention: Data will be kept while the relationship is active or as required by law, or until deletion is requested where applicable.

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis
section3.content: The legal basis is performance of the contract and, where applicable, user consent for optional communications.

section4.title: 4. Recipients
section4.content: Data may be shared with vendors necessary to provide the service (processors) such as hosting, database, authentication, analytics, communications, and payment providers, under appropriate safeguards.

section5.title: 5. Rights

terminos.title: Terms of Use
terminos.intro: These terms govern access to and use of Aliigo and its services.

section1.title: 1. The Service
section1.content: Aliigo is a SaaS platform that enables businesses to use an AI assistant on their websites and manage related configuration, content, and integrations. Features may evolve over time.

section2.title: 2. User Account
section2.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activity under your account. You must notify us of any unauthorized use.

section3.title: 3. Prices and Payments
section3.content: Paid features require an active subscription. Pricing, billing cycles, and applicable taxes are disclosed during checkout. Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled before renewal.

section4.title: 4. Cancellation
section4.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Access remains until the end of the current paid period, unless otherwise required by law.

section5.title: 5. Platform Content, Messaging, and AI Outputs
section5.content: You are solely responsible for all content, prompts, instructions, configurations, messages, and materials you or your end users submit, collect, send, or display through Aliigo, including any communications sent to customers (SMS, email, chat, or otherwise). You must ensure compliance with applicable laws, including data protection and anti-spam rules, and obtain all required consents. Aliigo may generate AI-assisted outputs based on the information and instructions you provide. AI outputs may be inaccurate or inappropriate and must be reviewed and used at your own risk. You are responsible for implementing appropriate guardrails, reviewing outputs, and deciding whether and how to use or send them.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: Aliigo does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation. To the maximum extent permitted by law, Aliigo is not liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or for loss of profits, revenue, data, or goodwill arising from or related to use of the service.

section7.title: 7. Indemnity
section7.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Aliigo from claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses arising from your use of the service, your content, your communications, your AI configurations, or your violation of law or third-party rights.

section8.title: 8. Acceptable Use
section8.content: You must not use Aliigo to transmit unlawful, harmful, deceptive, infringing, harassing, or abusive content, or to send spam or unauthorized marketing. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or pose risk to the platform or others.

section9.title: 9. Applicable Law
section9.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Spain. For disputes, the parties submit to the courts of the Owner's domicile, unless mandatory law provides otherwise.
